name: .LVI
summary: Learn about .LVI files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: To use an LVI file to restore your Windows system, insert the media or connect the drive on which the LVI file is stored to your PC. Then, turn on your PC. If your PC does not automatically boot from the external media or device, edit your BIOS settings to boot from the media or device. Your computer should then boot from your LVI file, allowing you to restore your system.
